sys_script_include.name: eleve_util_scripts

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_d746377c1b59f910d991c882604bcb22
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_ndecd_triage_2_0.eleve_util_scripts</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>eleve_util_scripts</name><script><![CDATA[var eleve_util_scripts = Class.create();
eleve_util_scripts.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	list_eleve: function(){
		gs.info('xxxxxxxxxxx');
		var user=[];
		var userrec=new GlideRecord('sys_user');
		userrec.get(gs.getUser().getID());


		var ecousers=new GlideRecord('sys_user');

		ecousers.addEncodedQuery('u_nom_de_l_ecole='+userrec.u_nom_de_l_ecole+'^u_user_type=eleve');

		ecousers.query();
		
		while(ecousers.next()){
			user.push(ecousers.sys_id.toString());
		}
		return 'sys_idIN'+user.toString();
	},

    type: 'eleve_util_scripts'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>servicenowdeveloper3@ecolecatholique.ca</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-09-13 13:31:26</sys_created_on><sys_id>d746377c1b59f910d991c882604bcb22</sys_id><sys_mod_count>18</sys_mod_count><sys_name>eleve_util_scripts</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Triage 2.0" source="x_ndecd_triage_2_0">c48de0481bafed508d594047bc4bcb3d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Triage 2.0">c48de0481bafed508d594047bc4bcb3d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_d746377c1b59f910d991c882604bcb22</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>servicenowdeveloper3@ecolecatholique.ca</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-09-14 15:59:37</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
